examples: The condition prevents the blood from circulating freely.
La condición impide que la sangre circule libremente.
Cooled air is circulated throughout the building.
El aire enfriado circula por todo el edificio.
Rumours began to circulate about his financial problems.
Comenzaron a circular rumores sobre sus problemas financieros.
There's a story circulating around the office that you are about to leave the company.
Hay una historia que circula por la oficina de que está a punto de dejar la empresa.
